headline: A Gem
pros: Smart leadership, inspiring vision, guiding values are actually demonstrated.
cons: Working in an emerging market location (Minneapolis, MN) made it difficult to feel connected to the team at HQ (Fargo, ND).

headline: A good firm that needed a boost
pros: Experience at learning some of the markets including company interactions
cons: Mixed: A stepping stone for some (like NY1 news channel, anchors go on to other things), stagnant for others. No different from other firms.

headline: Role
pros: Interesting work but it was all just ideas
cons: Was never paid! Eventually left. Swindled out of more than $20,000

headline: Operations
pros: Former CEO was a brilliant guy, small firm experience
cons: Management turnover, no transparency, no communication, lack of direction from partners

headline: OPERATIONS
pros: Experience, small firm, capital markets exposure, access to upper management
cons: No advancement, no advancement, no advancement

headline: Trader
pros: small number of employees, flexible scheduling
